description: Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 16 March 2016 (RN: 16/00374/FULL) which itself varied condition 1 of planning permission dated 28 July 2015 (RN: 15/02336/FULL) for excavation of a basement beneath existing building, part of front and rear gardens, demolition of rear facade, extensions to the rear and at roof level in connection with the use of the building as a single house. NAMELY, to allow revisions to the basement, lower ground floor and ground floor layout; other internal room layout alterations, alterations  to existing consented ground floor rear terrace area; amendments to rear elevation including bay windows and consented French windows; alterations to fenestration along side elevations; raising of existing roof ridge; regrading of existing side passageways from front to rear garden along site boundary to more; alterations to front garden planters.
